## Making `precipitation` ordinal: solution {background-color="aliceblue"}
```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data as vega_data
seattle = vega_data.seattle_weather()
alt.Chart(seattle).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('month(date):O', title = "Month"),
    alt.Y('average(precipitation):O', title = "Average rainfall (in.)")
)
```

```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data as vega_data
seattle = vega_data.seattle_weather()
alt.Chart(seattle).mark_bar().encode(

```

`altair` now orders `precipitation` *alphabetically*
